languages.text: {n}Юноша пытается повернуть голову, черная кожа хрустит и раскрывается алыми трещинами.{/n} "Здесь был ткач... Он начертал... Затем дал воды... И прошептал странный стих... сказал запомнить и прочитать... чтобы помощь пришла. И вы здесь! Значит, пора..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Юноша пытается повернуть голову, черная кожа хрустит и раскрывается алыми трещинами.{/n} "Здесь был ткач... Он начертал... Затем дал воды... И прошептал странный стих... сказал запомнить и прочитать... чтобы помощь пришла. И вы здесь! Значит, пора..."

languages.text: {n}He tries to turn his head, his blackened skin crunching as it opens into scarlet cracks.{/n} "A spinner came... He painted the symbol... Then he gave me water... and whispered a strange verse... He told me to memorise it and to recite it later... so that help would come. And here you are! Then I should..."
languages.original_text: {n}Юноша пытается повернуть голову, черная кожа хрустит и раскрывается алыми трещинами.{/n} "Здесь был ткач... Он начертал... Затем дал воды... И прошептал странный стих... сказал запомнить и прочитать... чтобы помощь пришла. И вы здесь! Значит, пора..."

Then he gave me water... and whispered a strange verse... He told me to memorise it and to recite it later... so that help would come. And here you are! Then I should..."

Then he gave me water... and whispered a strange verse... He told me to memorise it and to recite it later... so that help would come. And here you are! Then I should..."

Then he gave me water... and whispered a strange verse... He told me to memorise it and to recite it later... so that help would come. And here you are! Then I should..."

{n}He tries to turn his head, his blackened skin crunching as it opens into scarlet cracks.{/n} "A spinner came... He painted the symbol... Then he gave me water... and whispered a strange verse... He told me to memorise it and to recite it later... so that help would come. And here you are! Then I should..."

languages.text: {n}Lorsqu'il essaie de tourner la tête, sa peau noircie se craquelle en fissures écarlates.{/n} « Un tisseur est venu... Il a tracé le symbole... Il m'a donné de l'eau... et m'a murmuré un vers étrange... Il m'a dit de le mémoriser et de le réciter plus tard... pour appeler des secours. Et vous voici ! Je devrais sans doute... »
languages.original_text: {n}He tries to turn his head, his blackened skin crunching as it opens into scarlet cracks.{/n} "A spinner came... He painted the symbol... Then he gave me water... and whispered a strange verse... He told me to memorise it and to recite it later... so that help would come. And here you are! Then I should..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Lorsqu'il essaie de tourner la tête, sa peau noircie se craquelle en fissures écarlates.{/n} « Un tisseur est venu... Il a tracé le symbole... Il m'a donné de l'eau... et m'a murmuré un vers étrange... Il m'a dit de le mémoriser et de le réciter plus tard... pour appeler des secours. Et vous voici ! Je devrais sans doute... »

languages.text: {n}Intenta girar la cabeza y su piel ennegrecida se llena de grietas escarlatas.{/n} «Vino un tejedor... pintó el símbolo... me dio agua... y susurró un verso extraño... Me dijo que lo memorizase y lo recitase más adelante... para que vinieran a ayudarme. ¡Y han venido! Luego debía...».
languages.original_text: {n}He tries to turn his head, his blackened skin crunching as it opens into scarlet cracks.{/n} "A spinner came... He painted the symbol... Then he gave me water... and whispered a strange verse... He told me to memorise it and to recite it later... so that help would come. And here you are! Then I should..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Intenta girar la cabeza y su piel ennegrecida se llena de grietas escarlatas.{/n} «Vino un tejedor... pintó el símbolo... me dio agua... y susurró un verso extraño... Me dijo que lo memorizase y lo recitase más adelante... para que vinieran a ayudarme. ¡Y han venido! Luego debía...».

languages.text: {n}男が頭を動かそうとすると、黒くなった皮膚がパリッと破けて、緋色の割れ目が見えた。{/n}「織り手が来て…彼がシンボルを、描いたのです…それから水をくれて…妙な聖句を囁いたのです…それを暗記して、後で暗唱するようにと言って…そうすれば助けがくるからと。そして、あなたが来てくれた！ということは…」
languages.original_text: {n}He tries to turn his head, his blackened skin crunching as it opens into scarlet cracks.{/n} "A spinner came... He painted the symbol... Then he gave me water... and whispered a strange verse... He told me to memorise it and to recite it later... so that help would come. And here you are! Then I should..."

traits.locale_text: {n}男が頭を動かそうとすると、黒くなった皮膚がパリッと破けて、緋色の割れ目が見えた。{/n}「織り手が来て…彼がシンボルを、描いたのです…それから水をくれて…妙な聖句を囁いたのです…それを暗記して、後で暗唱するようにと言って…そうすれば助けがくるからと。そして、あなたが来てくれた！ということは…」
{n}男が頭を動かそうとすると、黒くなった皮膚がパリッと破けて、緋色の割れ目が見えた。{/n}「織り手が来て…彼がシンボルを、描いたのです…それから水をくれて…妙な聖句を囁いたのです…それを暗記して、後で暗唱するようにと言って…そうすれば助けがくるからと。そして、あなたが来てくれた！ということは…」

languages.text: {n}他想转过头，但烧焦的皮肤发出了噼啪声，露出了鲜红的裂缝。{/n}“有个织网者来过这里……是他画了那个符号……之后给我喂了水喝……还在我耳边低声念了几句怪诗……他说，我得把诗记住，背出来……这样就会有人来帮我。在那之后，你就来了！所以我应该……”
languages.original_text: {n}He tries to turn his head, his blackened skin crunching as it opens into scarlet cracks.{/n} "A spinner came... He painted the symbol... Then he gave me water... and whispered a strange verse... He told me to memorise it and to recite it later... so that help would come. And here you are! Then I should..."

traits.locale_text: {n}他想转过头，但烧焦的皮肤发出了噼啪声，露出了鲜红的裂缝。{/n}“有个织网者来过这里……是他画了那个符号……之后给我喂了水喝……还在我耳边低声念了几句怪诗……他说，我得把诗记住，背出来……这样就会有人来帮我。在那之后，你就来了！所以我应该……”
{n}他想转过头，但烧焦的皮肤发出了噼啪声，露出了鲜红的裂缝。{/n}“有个织网者来过这里……是他画了那个符号……之后给我喂了水喝……还在我耳边低声念了几句怪诗……他说，我得把诗记住，背出来……这样就会有人来帮我。在那之后，你就来了！所以我应该……”

languages.text: {n}Als er versucht, den Kopf zu drehen, platzt seine geschwärzte Haut zu blutenden Wunden auf.{/n} "Da war dieser Spinner ... Er hat das Symbol gemalt ... Dann gab er mir Wasser ... und flüsterte einen seltsamen Vers ... Er sagte, ich solle ihn mir merken und später aufsagen ... damit Hilfe kommt. Und da seid Ihr! Dann sollte ich ..."
languages.original_text: {n}He tries to turn his head, his blackened skin crunching as it opens into scarlet cracks.{/n} "A spinner came... He painted the symbol... Then he gave me water... and whispered a strange verse... He told me to memorise it and to recite it later... so that help would come. And here you are! Then I should..."

Dann gab er mir Wasser ... und flüsterte einen seltsamen Vers ... Er sagte, ich solle ihn mir merken und später aufsagen ... damit Hilfe kommt. Und da seid Ihr! Dann sollte ich ..."

languages.text: {n}Kararmış cildi çatlayarak altındaki kızıl tabakaya yer bırakan adam, başını çevirmeye çalışıyor.{/n} "Bir dokur geldi... Sembolü çizdi... Sonra bana su verdi... Garip bir şeyler söyledi... Dediklerini ezberleyip daha sonra tekrar etmemi istedi... Yardım gelecekmiş. Geldiniz işte! O zaman..."
languages.original_text: {n}He tries to turn his head, his blackened skin crunching as it opens into scarlet cracks.{/n} "A spinner came... He painted the symbol... Then he gave me water... and whispered a strange verse... He told me to memorise it and to recite it later... so that help would come. And here you are! Then I should..."
